alert.note: Alert for Thurston; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 9:30AM CDT until September 23 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wayne County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Thurston County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 930 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Wakefield, or 7 miles southeast of Wayne, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wakefield, Emerson, Winnebago, Thurston, Winnebago Reservation, and Omaha Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
